column1: Being aggrieved by the said judgment, the Appellant sought to impugn it on the following grounds

column2: The  learned District Court judge has failed to identify the corpus correctly
The deeds produced by the 13th  Respondent do not relate to the corpus
The  learned  District Court judge  misdirected  himself in  accepting the  pedigree,  deeds
and evidence of the Plaintiff and the 13th  Respondent
The learned District Court judge has failed to appreciate the fact that the Appellant and
her predecessor in title have been  in  long possession of the entirety of the corpus
